title: 📊 Market Intel — Mon Feb 16 2026 8:37 PM ET
content:
# 📊 Market Intel — Mon Feb 16, 2026 @ 8:37 PM ET

**🔑 Top Headlines: Bitcoin crashes to $68K amid recession fears | Harvard shifts crypto allocation to ETH | U.S. markets closed for Presidents' Day | Bluetooth privacy vulnerability exposed | AI vs Open Source debate heats up**

---

## 🔥 Top Trending

- **Bitcoin plunges to $68,000** — Crypto market "drowns in red." Bloomberg's Mike McGlone warns BTC could fall to $10K as U.S. recession risk builds, citing record market-cap-to-GDP and rising gold prices *(CoinDesk)*
- **Harvard cuts BTC exposure 20%, adds ETH position** — Unwinding bitcoin treasury premium trade, rotating into ether *(CoinDesk)*
- **Strategy (fka MicroStrategy) says it can survive BTC at $8,000** — Will "equitize" debt to weather downturn *(CoinDesk)*
- **Bluetooth privacy bombshell** — Research reveals what your Bluetooth devices expose about you, #1 on HN with 299 points *(blog.dmcc.io)*
- **"AI is destroying Open Source"** — Jeff Geerling's viral post sparks massive HN debate *(jeffgeerling.com)*

---

## 📈 Stock Movers

- **U.S. markets CLOSED** — Presidents' Day holiday, no trading
- **Futures/pre-market watch:** Fed minutes due this week — key catalyst
- **Crypto miners reporting:** Hive & Riot earnings this week
- **NBA All-Star Weekend** wrapping up — no major sports betting catalysts until Thursday

---

## 💰 Crypto & Digital Assets

- **BTC ~$68,000** — Major sell-off, down sharply. McGlone bearish call: $10K target
- **ETH stabilizing** after $540M sell wave, outperforming broader crypto market
- **Harvard endowment** rotating: -20% BTC, new ETH position
- **Strategy (MSTR)** confident it survives BTC at $8K, plans to equitize debt
- **Nexo re-enters U.S. market** — Partners with Bakkt for yield, lending, exchange
- **Hong Kong SFC** approves Victory Fintech — first crypto license since June
- **A7A5 stablecoin** — U.S.-sanctioned issuer building ruble-pegged crypto giant
- **Binance CZ** says lack of privacy blocking crypto adoption
- **Silicon Valley Bank** calls 2026 "crypto's year of integration" — bank-led stablecoins, tokenized T-bills, AI wallets
- **Crypto mining** industry pushes back on energy usage regulation — Paradigm says mining helps energy volatility

---

## 🔵 Bloomberg

- Bloomberg blocked (bot detection) — unable to scrape directly
- **Key Bloomberg-sourced stories circulating:** McGlone's $10K BTC call, recession risk indicators, gold vs. crypto divergence
- **Week ahead:** Fed rate-decision minutes, crypto miner earnings

## 🚀 Tesla / SpaceX / Elon

- No major breaking Tesla/SpaceX news today
- **Markets closed** — no TSLA price action
- **Watch this week:** Any Elon commentary on crypto crash, DOGE government updates

---

## 💻 AI & Tech

- **"AI is destroying Open Source"** — Jeff Geerling's blog post viral on HN, debating AI's parasitic relationship with OSS
- **Self-generated agent skills deemed "useless"** — Academic paper trending (#3 on HN, 238 pts)
- **GPT 4,600× speedup in C** — Developer optimizes Karpathy's microgpt.py with SIMD auto-vectorization
- **NanoClaw in Docker** — Running AI agents in sandboxed containers gaining traction
- **Free Wispr Flow alternative** — Open source voice input tool (freeflow) launched
- **Silicon Valley Bank** calls 2026 the year of AI-powered crypto wallets

---

## 🏈 Sports & Betting

- **NBA All-Star Weekend** wrapping up in San Francisco
- **Thursday NBA slate:** HOU (-2.5) @ CHA, BKN @ CLE (-13.5), ATL @ PHI
- **Kevin Durant** averaging 25.8 PPG with Houston (33-20)
- **Donovan Mitchell** 29.0 PPG leading Cleveland (34-21)
- **NCAA basketball** in full swing — March Madness approaching
- **Super Bowl LX** coverage ongoing on ESPN
- **Winter Olympics** Milan-Cortina buildup

---

## 💎 Commodities & Macro

- **Markets closed** — Presidents' Day
- **Gold rising** — McGlone cites gold strength as bearish signal for risk assets
- **Fed minutes due this week** — Major catalyst, markets watching for rate cut signals
- **Recession risk** — Record U.S. market-cap-to-GDP levels flagged as warning
- **Treasury yields** — Watch for movement when markets reopen Tuesday
